ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Truly your Lord is the Almighty, the Most Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Yet surely your Lord is mighty and powerful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Verily Your Lord is Immensely Mighty, Most Compassionate.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Your Lord is Majestic and All-merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And indeed your Lord – only He is the Almighty, the Most Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And verily your Lord, He is indeed the All-Mighty, the Most Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And most surely your Lord is the Mighty, the Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Surely thy Lord, He is the All-mighty, the All-compassionate.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And lo! thy Lord, He is indeed the Mighty, the Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: your Lord is the Mighty One, the Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And verily thy Lord! He is the Mighty, the Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed your Lord is the All-mighty, the All-merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And verily thy Lord is He, the Exalted in Might Most Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And verily! Your Lord, He is indeed the All-Mighty, the Most Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Your Lord, He is the Almighty, the Most Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Your Lord is the Almighty, the Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And indeed, your Lord - He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:175] Surely your Lord, He is the Mighty, the Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And lo! thy Lord, He is indeed the Mighty) in retribution against the disbelievers, (the Merciful) towards the believers.
